hero_title: The IT department for Monaco real estate
hero_subtitle: Internal tools, automations, custom software. Flat monthly fee, no quotes, no projects. Just things getting done.
personal_message_1: I've been working with real estate professionals on their IT for several years. I know your problems: Excel spreadsheets piling up, software that doesn't talk to each other, repetitive tasks wasting your time.
personal_message_2: My approach is simple: you tell me what's bothering you, I fix it. No endless quotes, no projects that drag on. A flat monthly fee, and I'm your IT department.
personal_message_3: I'm also building software specifically for Monaco real estate, so I'm deeply invested in understanding the industry.
problem_subtitle: Real estate professionals are stuck between expensive enterprise software and makeshift solutions
problem_card_1: Enterprise software is overkill and overpriced. Free tools lack features.
problem_card_2: You're in real estate, not in IT. You don't have time to deal with technical issues.
problem_card_3: Excel spreadsheets, copy-paste, manual entry... These repetitive tasks waste precious time.
solution_subtitle: Flat monthly fee. You tell me what you need, I build it. One thing at a time.
solution_point_1: Tools adapted to how you work, not the other way around.
solution_point_2: Eliminate repetitive tasks. Connect your tools together.
solution_point_3: I'm available when you need me. No tickets, no waiting.
services_title: What I can do for you
services_subtitle: Everything a real estate business needs on the technical side
services_card_1: Custom CRM, dashboards, portfolio management, transaction tracking... Tools that match how you work.
services_card_2: Listing sync, automatic alerts, generated reports, client follow-ups... Less copy-paste, more time for what matters.
services_card_3: Connect your existing tools together. Property portals, accounting, legal, e-signatures, calendars...
services_card_4: Modern showcase website, local SEO, online listing management.
services_card_5: Day-to-day IT issues, configuration, troubleshooting. One point of contact for all your needs.
services_card_6: I help you choose the right tools and train your team to use them effectively.
pricing_note_text: You submit requests, I work through them one at a time. No limits. No commitment.
target_subtitle: I work with real estate professionals in Monaco
target_card_1_description: Independent agencies who want tools suited to their size, without big group costs.
target_card_2_description: Managing projects, timelines, and stakeholders. Your processes deserve better than spreadsheets.
target_card_3_description: Tenant management, maintenance tracking, financial reporting. Let's automate the repetitive parts.
contact_subtitle: Let's discuss your needs over coffee in Monaco. No commitment, just to see if I can help.
contact_form_message_placeholder: Spreadsheets piling up? Software that doesn't talk to each other? Repetitive tasks?
process_step_1_description: We discuss your needs, I understand how you work.
process_step_2_description: I solve a concrete problem quickly to prove my value.
process_step_3_description: You submit requests, I work through them. Simple.
process_step_4_description: Your needs change, I adapt. Cancel anytime.
process_benefit_1_description: Fixed price, no quotes, no nasty surprises on the invoice.
process_benefit_2_description: No projects that drag on. Concrete results, regularly.
